custom_text.comment/custom text: If a log line has these words, apply colors from list

settings.comment/disable typewriter: Turn off the nice text effect
settings./comment/presence: use discord rich presence to show mh/s and chop time
settings./comment/client_id: put a different client id to change 'salad live logs' title
settings./comment/presence_messages: show these messages in presence status in order
